cmput301w16t08.scaling_pancake.controllers

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.app.Application
          • cmput301w16t08.scaling_pancake.controllers.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2

    public class Controller
extends android.app.Application
    The Controller class controls access to the model classes (which can access the Controller class with (Controller) getApplicationContext()), and uses the classes in ElasticsearchController to update the data on the server wherever needed.
    See Also:
    ElasticsearchController, User, Instrument, Bid, InstrumentList, BidList

      • searchInstruments

        public void searchInstruments(PrePostActionWrapper prePostActionWrapper,
                     java.lang.String keywords)
        Searches for any non-borrowed Instruments that contain the keywords in the supplied string. Returns an InstrumentList containing the Instruments that were found
        Parameters:
        keywords - the space-separated keywords to search
        prePostActionWrapper - a wrapper for functions defined in the view layer (can be null)
        See Also:
        InstrumentList, Instrument

      • acceptBidOnInstrument

        public void acceptBidOnInstrument(Bid bid)
        The currently logged in User accepts a Bid on one of it's Instruments. The instrument's status is set to borrowed and all other bids are declined.
        Parameters:
        bid - the bid to accept
        See Also:
        Bid, Instrument
